Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at NH Castellón Mindoro places you in the heart of Castellon de la Plana, walking distance from Castellon del Mar Cathedral and El Fadri. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Provincial Hospital of Castellon and Plaza de Toros de Castellon.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 102 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a sauna and a fitness center.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and laundry facilities. Planning an event in Castellon de la Plana? This hotel has 5552 square feet (516 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a sauna and a fitness center.
Make yourself at home in one of the 102 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

A stay at NH Castellón Mindoro places you in the heart of Castellon de la Plana, walking distance from Castellon del Mar Cathedral and El Fadri. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Provincial Hospital of Castellon and Plaza de Toros de Castellon.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Castellon del Mar Cathedral - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
El Fadri - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Provincial Hospital of Castellon - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Plaza de Toros de Castellon - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Jaume I University - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Plaza del Mar - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Gran Casino Castellon - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Castellon Planetarium - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Club de Golf Costa de Azahar - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
El Madrigal Stadium - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Heliopolis Beach - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi
Plaza Mayor - 11.1 km / 6.9 mi
Church of Santo Tomas - 11.9 km / 7.4 mi
Teatre Municipal de Benicassim - 11.9 km / 7.4 mi
Nature Reserve Desierto de las Palmas - 12.2 km / 7.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
Castellon de la Plana (CDT) - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Valencia (VLC) - 66.1 km / 41.1 mi

The preferred airport for NH Castellón Mindoro is Valencia (VLC).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Valencia Manises Airport (VLC): Approximate driving time is 60 minutes and distance is 70 kilometres (44 miles).

Taxis can be found outside the main terminal and; the journey should cost around €80. Alternatively, ‘Cercania’ suburban rail services run regularly from Valencia to Castellon.

Driving directions: From the airport, take the A-3/E-901 in the direction of Barcelona, Castellon. Continue on the V-30 and then CV-31. close to Valencia, change onto the Carretera De Valencia A Ademuz/CV-35 and continue for three kilometres until the Autopista Del Mediterrani/Autopista Del Mediterráneo/E-15. Follow until Exit 47, on the outskirts of Castellon, and follow signs into the city centre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
